    6:
    7: /*
    8: * YAML handler
    9: * {middleware}
    10: *
    11: * File\Read file_get_contents
    12: * File\Write file_put_contents
    13: * File\Append
    14: * File\Update
    15: *
    16: * Encode/Decode
    17: * Parse
    18: * Path
    19: * global
    20: * index
    21: * inheritance
    22: * Interpolate
    23: *

    26: /** Parse YAML
    27: * @param String $str
    28: * @return Object $obj
    29: */
    30: function decode(String $str) {
    31: $obj = false;
    32: if ($str) {
    33: try {
    34: $obj = \spyc_load($str);
    35: } catch (\Throwable $e) {
    36: $obj = yaml_parse_error($e, $str);
    37: }
    38: }
    39: return (object) $obj;
    40: }
    41:
    42: /** Convert Array to YAML
    43: * @param Array $array
    44: * @return String $yaml
    45: */
    46: function encode(Array $arr=NULL) {
    47: return ($arr) ? \spyc_dump($arr) : '';
    48: }
    49:
    50: /** Read, interpolate, expand YAML
    51: * @param String $name
    52: * @param Array $arr
    53: * @param Array $interp
    54: * @return Array $arr
    55: */
    56: function load(String $name, Array $arr, Array $interp=NULL) {
    57: $arr = array_filter($arr, function ($i) {
    58: return (!is_null($i)) ? true : false;
    59: });
    60: $arr = array_map(function ($p) use ($name) {
    61: return (is_file($p))
    62: ? read_as_content($p)
    63: // : load_possible($name, $p);
    64: : $p;
    65: }, $arr);
    66:
    67: /*
    68: if ($interp) {
    69: $yaml = str_replace(array_keys($interp), array_values($interp), $yaml);
    70: }
    71: return ($yaml) ? (object) \spyc_load($yaml) : false;
    72: */
    73: return $arr;
    74: }
    75:
    76: /** Load file as content attribute
    77: * @param String $path
    78: * @return Array $array [ 'content' ]
    79: */
    80: function read_as_content (String $path) {
    81: return [ 'content' => File\read($path) ];
    82: }
    83:
    84: /** Format YAML decode error
    85: * @param \Throwable $e
    86: * @param String $str
    87: * @return Array $array [ 'error', 'message', 'error_message', 'content' ]
    88: */
    89: function yaml_parse_error (\Throwable $e, String $str) {
    90: return [
    91: 'error' => true,
    92: 'message' => 'Yaml content contains an error.',
    93: 'error_message' => $e->getMessage(),
    94: 'content' => substr($str, 0, 255)
    95: ];
    96: }
